Headline: #49B North Western Temporary Reroute at Western/Devon
ShortDescription: 49B North Western buses are rerouted in both directions via Western, Devon, California, Pratt & Western, due to fire department activity near Western/Devon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#49B North Western  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Western, Devon, California, Pratt, then resume their normal route on Western, due to fire department activity near Western/Devon.

Allow extra travel time.
